Warranty & Support

(as of Nov 30,2022 12:39:52 UTC – Details)

From the brand

More Stable, Less Blocking: LISEN brand laboratory has upgraded this phone mount for car from 3 directions.① Upgrade extension arm to protect your phone overheating crash; ②Cell phone holder for car mount with most stable “Steel Hook”,③Cell phone car holder that has the most strong clamping force, which up to 48 LB (equivalent to 70 iPhone 13 Pro Max). LISEN provides at least 1 years of user service.
Protect Your Phone & Vent: There are lots of anti slip&scratch rubber pads on this phone holder for car ​for car vent. It will protect your mobile phone and automobile vent from scratches. Enjoy easy navigating, charing, calling, talking or listening to music on this carmount!
Compatible with Horizontal & Vertical Vents: The Steel hook clip of this cell phone mount for car is 50% longer than the ordinary one. It’s compatible with most Horizontal & Vertical vents, which solves the common problems of poor compatibility and cradle easy falling off on the market. We upgrade the iPhone car holder to meet all the needs of the car vent. Note: Round vents may not fit.
Doing Responsibly and SustainablyAs a responsible company, Lisen operates sustainably, to high environmental and social standards. We continue to embed sustainability ever deeper in the way we do business – in our own operations and beyond, together with our suppliers. Lisen cell phone holder for car also comes with 12 months warranty. Our expert team always stands by your side.

USING TIPS

  • IT IS RECOMMENDED USE FOR THE HORIZONTAL VENT.
  • This holder maximum support 0.4-1 inch long of blades, 0.1 inch thick of blades.
  • It is recommend that re-tighten the air vent clip once two week to ensure it keep stable.
  • This car phone holder is not compatible with round air vents;

Price: $29.99 - $15.99

From the brand

In the spring of 2018, with enthusiasm for digital products, a group of young people came together and found Andobil to help others enjoy Tech better.Staying curious and creative, we are always determined to combine minimalism with aesthetics to create products.Helping customers to enjoy the ultimate tech is our eternal pursuit.

【Phone’s Safe Like in an Infant Seat】This car phone holder with anti-scratched plate and soft rubber side pad design give your iPhone 13 iPhone 12 11 or Samsung 100% protection, makes your cell phones always sleep like a baby in the vent phone mount when driving. Secure air-bag design of this phone holder for car vent leaves zero scratches on your mobile phone even on bumpy roads.
【0.1s Quick Release One Hand Operation】 andobil car phone holder. More convenient and easier operation with new “Quick Release” button, comparing with other “One-hand operation” car phone mount, Andobil phone holder for car vent brings you brand new 0.1s-releasing experience. What’s more, the andobil car phone holder can withstand 300,000+ times open & close by repeated tests in Andobil laboratory.
【360° Flexible Rotation as Wish】 Best viewing angle when driving with this air vent car phone mount, it is designed with a 360° swivel ball joint, you can adjust your phone with a single hand for a horizontal, vertical, or more layout for navigating, phone talking, music listening, etc. Optimizing the perfect angle & position and offering safe driving experience.
【Wide Compatible with All Smartphones】 This andobil car cell phone holder is compatible with all cell phones from 4″ to 7″, the specially designed adjustable foot can be adjusted for different sizes and shapes, perfect for Apple iPhone 13 pro max, iPhone 13, iPhone 13, iPhone 12 pro max, iPhone 12, iPhone 12 mini, iPhone 11, X, XR, SE, 7, 6, Samsung Galaxy S21, S20, S10, Note 10, Moto G, Google Pixel, Huawei P30, Nokia, Xiaomi, OnePlus, Sony, LG, etc.
【Andobil Car Phone Holder Service】 Andobil is professional in designing and always making the best car phone holder for all the car drivers, including Uber, Lyft, Truck drivers, etc. what’s more, we will provide 2-year support. If you meet any questions or hesitations before purchasing or when using, please let us know, we would like to hear your voice and solve them for you in 12 hours.


Compatible with All Cellphones in 4”-7” size:

iPhone Series Compatible with iPhone 13 Pro Max, 13 Pro, 13, 12 Pro,12,12 Mini, iPhone 11, 11 Pro, 11 Pro Max, 8 Plus, 8, X, XS max, XS, XR, 7 Plus, 7, etc.
Samsung Series Compatible with Samsung Galaxy S22, S21 Ultra, S20, S10, S9, S8, S7 Edge, Note 20, Note 10, Note 9, Note 8, etc.
LG Series Compatible with LG G8, G7 ThinQ, G6+, V50, V40 ThinQ, V30, Stylo 4, Optimus, etc.
Google Series Compatible with Google Pixel 4, 4XL, 3, 3XL, 2, 2XL, XL, Nexus 6P, 6, 7, 5X, etc.
Huawei Series Compatible with Huawei Mate 40, Mate 30 Pro, Mate 20, P40, P30, P20, etc
Oneplus Series Compatible with Oneplus 7 Pro, 6T, 6, 5T, 5, X, etc.
Other Cellphone Series Compatible with Moto G7, Z3, Nokia 7.1/ 6.1, etc.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $29.99 - $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:19:41 UTC – Details)


Superior comfort Unlike some pillows that become flattened over time, the Samsonite lumbar support cushion will remain and never flatten thanks to the high-density memory foam structure. By attaching it to your chosen chair you are providing additional support to your lower back to help ease any discomfort. Hours spent sitting at a desk can negatively impact our posture so by using the support cushion you are creating an ergonomic experience that will provide comfort by moulding to the shape of your back.
Super easy to use Measuring 13.5 inches x 14 inches x 4.5 inches, the lumbar support cushion features an integrated adjustable strap that allows an easy and secure fit to most chairs including office swivel chairs, car seats, truck seats, dining chairs, plane seats and more, and wheelchairs. The convenient slider buckle positioned on the strap can be positioned easily for you to achieve the perfect fit. It only takes a moment to set your cushion up for a more comfortable sitting experience.
BUY NOW and support your lower back throughout the day with the lumbar support pillow from Samsonite
Mesh Cover
NEVER FLATTENS – give yourself superior lumbar support with our back support pillow. Designed to hold its shape even after multiple uses, it will never flatten down or thin out so you will always receive comfortable support wherever you choose to use it. The support pillow helps to improve posture and provide comfort whilst you sit and eat, drive, work, watch TV, read and so much more.
JUST THE RIGHT SUPPORT – the high-grade memory foam is perfectly firm, so you won’t find it too soft or too hard. Designed to suit most adults who require a lumbar support pillow for office chair, car or other seating option. Featuring an ergonomic curve, it sits perfectly against your back once secured in place providing you hours of comfort when you’re working or driving.
IMPROVE YOUR SITTING POSTURE – if you sit for long hours at a time in an office or drive long distances on a regular basis then you can create a more comfortable seating position by attaching our lumbar support pillow to your seat or chair. It is designed to offer support to your lower back thanks to the integrated memory foam which provides cushioning as you sit.
MULTIPURPOSE DESIGN – featuring an easy to use, adjustable strap you can use the lumbar support pillow in the workplace on your office chair, when relaxing at home, while driving your car on road trips, and on plane seats when flying. It is also great for adding to a wheelchair for more comfort and gamers love it for extra support when gaming. If you choose to use the lumbar support pillow for car journeys it will always remain in place, regardless of the terrain.
BREATHABLE EASY TO CLEAN MESH – the 3D mesh outer layer encourages air circulation throughout the pillow, you can remove this cover and machine wash it to keep your lumbar support pillow looking and smelling fresh. Make discomfort when sitting a thing of the past with our lumbar support pillow which will keep you stable, secure and cushioned when working, driving and relaxing.

Samsonite’s Ultimate Support for your Lower Back

This lumbar support pillow has been designed to help elevate comfort, particularly in your lower back, for those who sit for long periods of time at work, home office, or drive for long hours. This lumbar pillow keeps you sitting upright and secure throughout your busy day.

The Ideal Solution for an Office or your Home

This lumbar support pillow can be used in a wide variety of situations. Office workers find our lumbar pillow to be an essential accessory when working at their desks or home for extended periods of time as they are less inclined to slump in their chair.

Ultimate Lumbar Support for your Car

Excellent for long car journeys or those who drive long distance on a daily basis such as truck and taxi drivers or sales representatives, this lumbar pillow will help you to arrive at your destination feeling comfortable and refreshed.

Samsonite’s High-Grade Memory Foam

Each of our lumbar support pillows are made from high grade memory foam which naturally helps to mold your body to the pillow. Comfortable to use, yet firm enough to provide ultimate support, our lumbar pillow is designed to be durable and long lasting for multiple years’ worth of use. This back pillow also features a mesh, breathable outer layer to keep air circulating throughout the pillow.

Ergonomic Shape Designed to Elevate Comfort

This lumbar pillow complements your backs natural arches to elevate comfort while sitting for extended periods of time.This contoured shape of our lumbar pillow will gently help guide your lower back and spine to mold to the lumbar pillow for a secure and comfortable hold that provides maximum comfort.

4.5
Price: $29.99 - $19.99

Firmly Clip: The car phone holder mount has an adjustable handle lock clasp, which can easily and firmly fix the vent mounting clip to the car vent. NOTE: THIS PHONE MOUNT ONLY CAN HOOK ON HORIZONTAL AIR VENT BUT IT CANNOT BE USED ON VERTICAL OR ROUND AIR VENT
Broad Applicability: The ultra-wide adjustable arm design will make the car phone holder suitable for all mobile phones (4.0-7.2 inches), thin cases and other devices (width between 2.55-4.11 inches), such as GPS devices
Easy to Install: Clamp the car vent phone mount on the vent and rotate the handle lock ring. The quick release button and adjustable clamp arm make it very easy to sheathe and remove your phone just with one hand
Adjustable as your wish: With the 360° rotating and rotating ball joint, the iphone holder for car can be easily adjusted to the best viewing angle. Whenever and wherever, the phone holder for car vent can secure your driving safety
